It sounds to me that you should check out selenium:
http://www.openqa.org/selenium-core/
Since it runs within the actual browser I would imagine that it could handle
iFrames.

Never used it, just heard the buzz...
/J

On 1/10/07, nagendra.raja <nagendra.raja@...> wrote:
>
>   Hi,
>
> We are looking for a Framework, which is very power full in handling
> iframes and java script function and java script links to auto login
> to a web site such as www.bet365.com etc.
>
> We are trying with jwebunit, httpunit and htmlunit.. but none of them
> seems to handle iframes straigt.. Could any one guide us any better
> frameworks than this and also a way to tweek these frameworks to
> handle the iframes etc..
>
> Any suggestions are most appricated.
>
> Raja Nagendra Kumar,
> C.T.O
